entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
